column2: select B.MOBILE_NO, B.ADJ_AMT, B.ADJ_VALIDITY, B.BILLING_SYSTEM, PMDB..PM_F_FORMAT_DATE(B.VALID_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as VALID_DTM, PMDB..PM_F_FORMAT_DATE(B.EXPIRE_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as EXPIRE_DTM from PMDB..PM_BATCH_UFAIR B inner join PMDB..PM_PREPAID_LOAD_BATCH LD on (B.BATCH_ID = LD.BATCH_ID) where LD.ORDER_ID = @order_id
